00028 namespace boost{
00029         struct use_default;
00030 namespace assign{ 
00031 namespace v2{
00032 namespace put_compose_csv_aux{
00033 
00034     template<typename Pars = boost::mpl::vector0<> >
00035         class composer
00036     {
00037 
00038         typedef boost::use_default tag2_;
00039         typedef v2::ref::assign_copy::nth_result_of::fusion<tag2_> meta1_;
00040 
00041                 public:
00042         
00043                 BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(
00044                 std::size_t, 
00045             static_parameters_size = boost::mpl::size<Pars>::value
00046         );
00047 
00048         typedef typename boost::mpl::apply1<meta1_, Pars>::type pars_cont_type;
00049 
00050                 composer(){}
00051                 explicit composer(pars_cont_type const& p) : pars_cont( p ){}
00052 
00053         template<typename T>
00054         struct modulo_result
00055         {
00056                 typedef typename boost::mpl::push_back<
00057                         Pars,
00058                 T const
00059             >::type new_;
00060             typedef composer<new_> type;
00061         };
00062         
00063         template<typename T>
00064         typename modulo_result<T>::type
00065         operator%(T const& t)const
00066         {
00067                 typedef typename modulo_result<T>::type result_;
00068             return result_( this->pars_cont( t ) );
00069         }
00070                 
00071         template<std::size_t N, typename U = boost::mpl::na>
00072         struct result{
00073                 typedef put_compose_csv_aux::held<Pars, N, U> type;
00074         };
00075 
00076                 typename result<0>::type
00077         operator()()const 
00078             { 
00079                         typedef typename result<0>::type result_;
00080                 namespace ns = ref::assign_copy; 
00081                 return result_( 
00082                         *this, 
00083                         ns::csv_anon( _nil ) 
00084                 );
00085         } 
00086 
00087 #define MACRO1(N, U)\
00088     namespace ns = ref::assign_copy;\
00089     return result_( \
00090         this->pars_cont, \
00091         ns::csv_anon<U>( BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(N, _) ) \
00092     );\
00093 
00094 
00095 #define MACRO2(z, N, data)\
00096         template<typename T>\
00097         typename result<N, T>::type\
00098     operator()( BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(N, T &_) )const \
00099     { \
00100         typedef typename result<N, T>::type result_;\
00101         MACRO1( N, T )\
00102     } \
00103         template<typename T>\
00104         typename result<N, T const>::type\
00105     operator()( BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(N, T const &_) )const \
00106     { \
00107         typedef typename result<N, T const>::type result_;\
00108         MACRO1( N, T const )\
00109     } \
00110 
00111 
00112 BOOST_PP_REPEAT_FROM_TO(
00113         1,
00114     BOOST_PP_INC(BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_LIMIT_CSV_ARITY),
00115     MACRO2,
00116     ~
00117 )
00118 #undef MACRO1
00119 #undef MACRO2
00120 
00121                 protected:
00122                 pars_cont_type pars_cont;
00123         
00124     };
